ygData.subject: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: This is true for most abilities but not all.  I personally have been stuck at skill level 40 in Forage for 5 levels (now 17th).  Is anyone else
ygData.messageBody:
This is true for "most" abilities but not "all." I personally have been
stuck at skill level 40 in Forage for 5 levels (now 17th). Is anyone else
experiencing a skill cap on Foraging?

Ethric - Bard of Qeynos (Xegony)


----- Original Message -----
From: Fun Bob <fun-bob@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 6:25 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill Cap


> From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>
> Just to get everyone clear on the subject, your skill cap is
> 5 Times your Level, +5
> So, say your 10th level, your skill cap will be 55
> 10*5=50+5=55
> Rolande, drunken Bard of Povar
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Congratulations to "Trail Rider," our latest ONElist of the Week.
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Visit our homepage and share with us how ONElist is changing YOUR life!
>
